wikipedia_page.main: John Stewart Teasdale (born 15 October 1962) is a Scottish footballer, who played in the Football League for Wolverhampton Wanderers, Walsall, Hereford United and Blackpool. A product of the Scottish Highland Football League, Teasdale commenced his senior professional football career with Nairn County FC, and finished his senior career with Elgin City FC, and Rothes FC, also both Highland Football League clubs at that time.

response: *John Teasdale (wheat farmer) (1881–1962), chairman of the Australian Wheat Board
